quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Head and Books
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, gryffindor, witchcraft. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what Harry Potter book did the Brockdale Bridge collapse?

options.text: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix.
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

questions.question: Professor Sprout is head of Hufflepuff, one of the fictional Hogwarts houses.
Who is head of the fictional Gryffindor house?
Who is the Gryffindor ghost in the Harry Potter books?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nearly Headless Nick

questions.question: Fictional characters Fred and George Weasley get kicked out of Hogwarts.
Is Flitwick head of Huffllepuff house in the Harry Potter series of books?
Fictional character Mr. Weasley was on guard duty when the basilisk attacked him.
What magical object did Harry Potter use to save Ron from poisoning?
Does fictional character Ron Weasley live at 12, Grimmauld Place?
In the Harry Potter books, the Bloody Baron is Slytherins ghost.
Who is the ghost of Ravenclaw in the Harry Potter books?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Gray Lady

questions.question: Who is Headmaster at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in books 1-6 of the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Albus Dumbledore

questions.question: Who is head of Slytherin house in the book Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
Every headmaster/headmistress of the fictional Hogwarts school has had the same office.
Fictional character Professor Snape is head of Ravenclaw house.

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Book and Series
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, people, snicket. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the first book of the Harry Potter series, when Harry, Ron and Hermione went into the restricted corridor, what was the order of the obstacles to get to Quirrell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Devils Snare, keys, chessboard, potions

questions.question: What is the square root of 144?
What shape does Sirius Blacks Animagus take in the 3rd book of the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a black dog

questions.question: Which character from A Series of Unfortunate Events said that orphans were in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Esme Squalor

questions.question: In the novel The Penultimate Peril, Jaques Snicket was one of the two people who signed into the hotel as J.S..
Which of the following fictional characters, depicted by Lemony Snicket, is a poet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Isadora Quagmire

questions.question: Did Harry Potter marry Ginny Weasley?
How many people died at the fictional battle of Hogwarts?
All the books of the Harry Potter series are set in England and Scotland.
How many champions names came out of the fictional Goblet of Fire?
What is the address of the Order of the Phoenix headquarters in the Harry Potter novels?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: number 12, Grimmauld place

questions.question: Which of the following were mentioned in the book The Ersatz Elevator?

options.text: The Prime Minister of New York

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The King of Arizona

questions.question: Where did fictional character Tom Riddle (Voldemort) live before going to live and study at Hogwarts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an orphanage

questions.question: Is Harry Potter a member of Gryffindor house?
Who was the first guardian to whom the Baudelaires were sent in A Series of Unfortunate Events?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Count Olaf

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Characters and Baudelaires
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, tuck, sportacus. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In The Silver Chair, Eustace Scrubb returns to Narnia with his schoolmate Jill Pole, who attends what school with him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Experiment House

questions.question: This show centers around a young girl, who speaks English and Chinese, and teaches problem solving. Other characters featured on the show are the girls grandfather,  Ye Ye, and her friends Rintoo, Tolee, Hoho, and Lulu.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan

questions.question: In A Series of Unfortunate Events, whose head was always hidden behind a cloud of smoke?
Linny, Tuck, and Ming MIng too! These schoolhouse animals are always using teamwork to save baby animals in trouble.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wonder Pets

questions.question: This character is in a show with his two friends, Widget and Walden. He is yellow with a long, springy tail, and greets people by saying, Wow wow.
This show follows Pablo the Penguin, Tyrone the Moose, Tasha the Hippopotamus, Austin the Kangaroo, and Uniqua on their imaginary adventures in the backyard.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Backyardigans

questions.question: The show Dora the Explorer features a little girl who goes on all sorts of adventures with her friend, Tico the Dog.
This show features characters with offbeat names like Muno, Foofa, Brobee, Toodee, Plex, and DJ Lance.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yo Gabba Gabba!

questions.question: In the second book of A Series of Unfortunate Events, did Count Olaf trick the Baudelaires into thinking he was really Stephano?
In A Series of Unfortunate Events, Klaus was the best inventor out of all the Baudelaires.
The show Blues Clues featured 2 different hosts during its run. What were their names?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steve and Joe

questions.question: This show features an active hero named Sportacus, who uses exercise and good nutrition to thwart the schemes of the slothful Robbie Rotten. Most of the characters in this show are puppets.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lazy Town

questions.question: This young boy started off in his cousin Dora the Explorers show, but soon received his own show. He is an animal rescuer, along with his sister, Alicia.
In which of Lemony Snickets books does Jaques Snicket die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Vile Village

questions.question: A TV show that debuted in 2002 features 2 bunnies. Max is a 3 year-old bunny that is always doing something to distract his sister, although he always manages to help her in the end. What is his sisters name?

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Jill and Eustace
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, actor, signs. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which character from the book The Silver Chair accompanies Jill and Eustace back to their own world when Aslan sends them out of his country?
What sort of creature is Glimfeather, who helps Eustace and Jill get started on their journey in The Silver Chair?
In the novel The Silver Chair, Aslan gives Jill and Eustace a task and four signs to help them find the way. What is the task?

options.text: To kill the evil Green Witch, who has terrorized Narnia for a decade
To prevent an attack from the underworld upon Narnia
To free the talking beasts of Narnia from the tyranny of the Giants
To find the Prince Rilian, who has been missing for ten years

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To find the Prince Rilian, who has been missing for ten years

questions.question: Cho Chang was Harry Potters girlfriend.
Which of the following statements most correctly describes Puddleglum the Marsh-Wiggles outlook on life in C.S. Lewiss book The Silver Chair?

options.text: He is an optimist and is usually proved wrong
He is an optimist, but is usually proved right
He is a pessimist and is usually proved right
He is a pessimist, but is usually proved wrong

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He is a pessimist, but is usually proved wrong

questions.question: What happens to Eustace as a result of Jills showing off at the edge of the cliff in the book The Silver Chair?

options.text: He looses his balance and falls
He is attacked by a lion

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He looses his balance and falls

questions.question: What is the name of the actor who portrayed Harry Potter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel Radcliffe

questions.question: When Jill, Eustace and Puddleglum reach the Underworld, in The Silver Chair, they pass a large person sleeping and are told that this is who?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Father Time

questions.question: In The Silver Chair, Jill has a dream in which she sees what two words out of the window of her room?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Under Me

questions.question: The first of the signs given to Jill by Aslan in The Silver Chair was that Eustace was to see an old friend. Who did that old friend turn out to be?
In The Silver Chair, Jill and Eustace are allowed the privilege to ride what creature, which is most often too proud to be ridden?
Which character in The Silver Chair burns his foot while putting out a magical fire created by the Green Witch?
In The Silver Chair, Prince Rilian is found to be under the enchantment of the Green Witch.  What happens to Rilian for one hour each night under the Witchs spell?

options.text: He forgets who he is and goes on a murderous rampage
He enters the world of dreams and comes back with ingredients for the Witchs potions
He relives the death of his mother through the eyes of the serpent that killed her
He remembers who he is and must be tied to a Silver Chair to prevent his escape

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He remembers who he is and must be tied to a Silver Chair to prevent his escape

questions.question: What happens to Eustace, Jill and Puddleglum in The Silver Chair, when they knock on the gate of the Giant city of Harfang?

options.text: They are captured by the Giants and thrown into cages.
They are turned away by the Giants that live there and forced to sleep out in the cold.
They are allowed entry and are given food, warm drink and beds.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are allowed entry and are given food, warm drink and beds.

questions.question: In the Silver Chair, Eustace, Jill and Puddleglum rescue Rilian from the Silver Chair after he begs them to do it in whose name?

options.text: in the name of the White Witch
in the name of the Green Witch

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in the name of Aslan

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Voyage and Island
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, ship, books. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Did Harry Potters parents die on Halloween?
While walking across the island of Felimath, featured in the book The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, Caspian, Reepicheep and the three children come across a band of men who they discover to be what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Slave Traders

questions.question: As the ship voyages past Magician Coriakins island, the voyagers in the novel The Voyage of the Dawn Treader come across an island surrounded by a shroud of utter darkness. After entering this shroud, what type of animal sheds light to help them escape?
The Duffers, described in The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, have made themselves invisible and wish Lucy to help them become visible again. What was strange about the Duffers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They had only one foot

questions.question: In The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, the three children travel to Narnia by what magical object?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A painting

questions.question: What was the name of the DADA teacher in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: In The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia along with a boy named Eustace. What relation is Eustace to Lucy and Edmund?

In The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, after rescuing Lord Rhoop, the voyagers land upon another island where they find a large banquet table and three Lords of Narnia, each in an enchanted sleep due to what?

options.text: Eating the fruit from the banquet table
Drinking the wine from the flagon on the table
Insulting the daughter of the Lord of the island
Touching the stone knife laying on the table

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Touching the stone knife laying on the table

questions.question: Sailing past Ramandus island, the voyagers from The Voyage of the Dawn Treader spot a white mass on the horizon. As they approach the white mass, they discover that the sea is covered in what?
How many books are in the Harry Potter series?

At the beginning of the voyage, depicted in The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, Eustace is a nuisance to all aboard the Dawn Treader, including Reepicheep the mouse, whom he greatly offends by doing what?

options.text: Swinging him around by his tail
Insulting the honor of his mother

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Swinging him around by his tail

questions.question: What name do the voyagers in The Voyage of the Dawn Treader give to the island on which they find the armor and sword of Lord Restimar lying beside a small pool of clear water?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deathwater Island

questions.question: What was the job of Harry Potters dad?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He didnt work.

questions.question: In the third book of the Chronicles of Narnia, the three children are rescued from the sea by Caspian and the crew of the Dawn Treader, who are on a voyage east from Narnia to find what?

options.text: A wife for Caspian to make Queen of Narnia
Seven Lords of Narnia banished by Caspians uncle, Miraz
Five Rings of Power created by Aslan

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seven Lords of Narnia banished by Caspians uncle, Miraz

questions.question: What is the name of the anti-Ministry of Magic radio station in Harry Potter and the Deadly Hallows?

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Harry Potter and Book
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, pevensie, snakes. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: C.S. Lewis titled his book, Prince Caspian, after the main character, but kept one of his working titles as a subtitle. What is the subtitle of this book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Return to Narnia

questions.question: How did Riddles Magical Diary go into Ginnys hand in the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?

options.text: She saw it lying on the floor and took it.
She found it in her trunk.
Lucius Malfoy put it in Ginnys cauldron.
She found it in the girls bathroom at Hogwarts

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lucius Malfoy put it in Ginnys cauldron.

questions.question: Being the last to go to the barrier between platform 9 and 10 at Kings Cross Station, Harry Potter and Ron were not able to get to platform nine and three-quarters.
Harry Potter draws a sword from the Sorting Hat during his duel with Tom Riddle and the Basilisk in the Chamber of Secrets. The sword belongs to which of the four founders of Hogwarts houses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Godric Gryffindor

questions.question: Which of the Pevensie children first sees Aslan as they journey with the dwarf Trumpkin in the book Prince Caspian?
Dobby, the house-elf, has been collecting Harry Potters letters to make it seem as though his friends had forgotten him.

In the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, Harry used the Hover Charm to destroy a pudding that Aunt Petunia had made for an important dinner party attended by Uncle Vernons potential client and the clients wife.
In the novel Prince Caspian, what two creatures did the dwarf Nikabrik bring into Prince Caspians counsel in an attempt to convince him to use dark magic against King Miraz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A hag and a werewolf

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, Harry Potter destroyed Riddles Diary with one of the Basilisks poisonous fangs.

In the novel The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, the sea eventually becomes too shallow for the ship to continue and it must turn back, but several members of the crew will continue in the landing boat, hoping to reach Aslans country. On Aslans orders, which of the following characters was made to stay with the Dawn Treader for its return voyage?
What do you call the fictional language of snakes, according to J. K. Rowlings second book in the Harry Potter series?
What is the name of the house-elf who warned Harry Potter of not going back to school?
In Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, the car which Harry and Ron rode on to Hogwarts, when they werent able to board on Hogwarts Express, crashed into the Whomping Willow.
What was the name of Harrys new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher in the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gilderoy Lockhart

questions.question: What sort of clothing freed Dobby, the house-elf, from the Malfoys according to the second Harry Potter book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a sock
